## R Markdown

## So far in this project, we have done research on how to get genetic code from NCBI and put it into R Studio, how to put the genome sequence into a string of characters, and find start and stop codons for that sequence. Here is a link that I have been basing my research off of: https://a-little-book-of-r-for-bioinformatics.readthedocs.io/en/latest/src/chapter7.html -Allison Derry
